mp3.description: Android平台录音支持MP3格式文件

privacyDescription.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires access to your photo library to upload product images for generating creative videos. It will not be used for any other purpose.
privacyDescription.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app requires permission to save generated creative videos to your photo library. It will not be used for any other purpose.
privacyDescription.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires access to your camera to capture product photos needed for generating creative videos. It will not be used for any other purpose.
privacyDescription.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app requires access to your microphone for recording audio while capturing product videos. It will not be used for any other purpose.
privacyDescription.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app requires Face ID access for Apple Sign-In. It will not be used for any other purpose.
privacyDescription.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This app requires access to your local network to connect with the server. It will not be used for any other purpose.

privacyDescription.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: 应用需要该权限，用于上传生成创意视频所需的产品图片，不会用作其他用途
privacyDescription.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: 应用需要该权限，用于下载存储生成的创意视频，不会用作其他用途
privacyDescription.NSCameraUsageDescription: 应用需要该权限用于下载存储生成的创意视频，不会用作其他用途
privacyDescription.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: 应用需要该权限，用于拍摄生成创意视频所需的产品照片，不会用作其他用途
privacyDescription.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: 应用需要该权限，用于Apple登陆，不会用作其他用途
privacyDescription.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: 应用需要该权限，用于与服务器建立连接，不会用作其他用途
